backend/main.mo: Defines data types for chapters, verses, moods, and chatbot responses, and initializes a map of verses for Bhagavad Gita Chapter 1. Includes helper functions and storage maps for verse lookup.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files, describing their roles and behaviors in the app.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Documentation outlining app architecture, navigation flows, key components, and backend API surface.
frontend/docs/DEPLOY_REPORT.md: Template for recording details and outcomes of deployment attempts.
frontend/docs/DEPLOY_ROOT_CAUSE.md: Template for documenting root-cause analysis of deployment failures.
frontend/docs/DEPLOY_RUNBOOK.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites, build steps, verification, and troubleshooting procedures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing tab navigation, scroll resets, session context, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat composer with text input, keyboard send, placeholder rotation, and optional speech-to-text voice input.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: A modal dialog explaining safety disclaimers about the chat not being medical or therapeutic advice.
Renders a sequence of chat messages with optional verse cards, action steps, and follow‑up questions.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Displays suggested follow‑up question buttons that trigger a callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/chat/HomeAskKris: Main chat interface handling message flow, API responses, history, errors, and safety modal logic.
frontend/src/components/chat/MiniAskKris: Compact input widget allowing users to submit a quick message to Krishna.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Shows an error alert with a retry button for failed data queries.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Image component that swaps to a fallback or placeholder if the primary source fails to load.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Flow: Placeholder decoration component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Kris: Displays layered Krishna‑themed background images with a readability gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Top navigation bar enabling tab switching and scroll‑to‑top behavior on Home.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button that toggles between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Fetches and displays today's verse with loading, error, and retry states.
Displays a verse card with collapsible Sanskrit, English translation, Gen-Z interpretation, and an action step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refetching related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching chapters, verses, moods, and chatbot responses through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements speech-to-text using browser APIs with start/stop controls and transcript state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, dark mode settings, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Renders a mood selection grid and transitions to a detail view or chat based on user mood selection.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Displays mood-specific curated verses with loading states and actions to go back or start a Krishna chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing Krishna chat widget, hero content, and navigation buttons for wisdom, reading, chat, and discovery.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Shows detailed list of verses for a chapter with table layout, loading/error states, and verse selection handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Lists all chapters with search, loading/error states, and actions to view a chapter or today's wisdom.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Controls navigation between chapter list, today's wisdom, chapter detail, and verse detail views based on user actions and session intent.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Displays a single verse with loading/error handling and a back action to return to the chapter view.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements chat with Krishna, managing messages, pending prompts, API responses, and follow-up interactions.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides a React context storing mood, chat history, pending messages, and read‑Gita intents, with helpers to update and consume these values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and container settings using plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including update summary, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
